data.text:
@MDHealthDept @CDCgov Why does it take two frigging months to report how many positive cases and how many hospitalizations are fully vaccinated????
Which is worse agency is worse when it comes to lying and hiding Data, the CDC or MD Health Dept????
@dawn_kestrel @ErstwhileIII @MDHealthDept @StateMaryland @CDCgov Why do kids need the booster?  Their risk of serious illness is so low.
@MDHealthDept @CDCgov Did you see the Pfizer date dunk today ? Only 9 pages of adverse side effects . Look it up

@ErstwhileIII @MDHealthDept @StateMaryland @CDCgov The booster data is especially troubling for younger age groups.  We need better communication that everyone over 12 who is over 5 months past becoming fully vaccinated should get their booster shots.

The screenshot below is from the CDC website County View for Maryland. https://t.co/blRqMTr0Z9

@MDHealthDept @CDCgov The fully vaccinated CDC data for Maryland:

18+ 83.7% fully vaccinated
5+ 78.8% fully vaccinated

The 5-11 year old population in MD is significantly under vaccinated with only ~38% being fully vaccinated.

https://t.co/74H7DWnSwY https://t.co/HETu3eWjAE
@MDHealthDept @StateMaryland @CDCgov Still emphasis on wrong metric -- only 2.1million of our states' over 6 million residents are boosted.
